briefTitle: Imaging of Patients With Known or Suspected Somatostatin Receptor Positive Neuroendocrine Tumors Using Cu64-DOTATATE
officialTitle: An Open-label, Single-dose, Single Arm, Single-center Clinical Trial of 64Cu(Copper)-DOTATATE (NETMedixâ„¢) PET-CT Scan for Imaging Patients With Known or Suspected Somatostatin Receptor-positive Neuroendocrine Tumors (NETs)
summary: This is an open-label, single-dose, single-arm, single-center imaging study using DOTATATE peptide, labelled with the 64Cu tracer.

primaryOutcome.measure: Sensitivity of 64Cu-DOTATATE PET-CT Imaging for Detection of Somatostatin Receptor Positive SSTR (+) Tumor
